group_1.textRight: You know, I...don't have any dream I want@to come true, or to become someone I'm not.
My daughter...she was my only reason@to live.
She was my reason for working tirelessly.@She was my reason to keep going...
It's like I've lost my reason to live,@you know.

group_1.textLeft: (In that state of hopelessness,@he received a Witch's Kiss...)
(Is that why he was seemed so relaxed@even after being saved...?)

group_1.textRight: And all those little traces of her still remain.@It's too much for me to go back home,
so night after night, here I am wasting@my life away in the park.
What a hopeless adult, right?

group_1.textLeft: Fu...mu...

group_1.textRight: Come to think of it, you left your home@and the whole town, didn't you?

group_1.textLeft: Fumu...

group_1.textRight: I don't blame you.
You had to watch something so tragic@in person.

group_1.textLeft: (You're wrong... I didn't just see it...)

group_1.textRight: I know you must hurt, too,@having lost so many friends...
You even lost your ability to talk...@It's painful to be in this town, isn't it...

group_1.textLeft: (You're wrong...!@Don't pity me like that...!)
(I'm not the innocent victim@you think I am!)

group_1.textRight: Since it's Valentine's, did you come@to see your parents?

group_1.textLeft: F-fumu...

group_1.textRight: Ah, then those chocolates...

group_1.textLeft: Mu...

group_1.textRight: Knew it.
You made them with the ingredients@I gave you, didn't you?
That's a very wonderful thing@of you to do.

group_1.textLeft: (What he will never be able to get@from his child...)
(I'm about to give to my own parents...)

group_1.textRight: ...Haha, no need to make things awkward.
If it helped in any little way,@it was the right thing to do.

group_1.textLeft: (If, for example, I gave him half@of my chocolates right now,)
(would he cheer up a little and@start to feel better...)
(But would that really be a good thing...?)
(Probably not, right...)
(It would be offensive, and come across@like it's for my own satisfaction...)
(That's what it would be...)
(And for me to even do anything for him,)
(that's overstepping it to begin with...!)
(All I can do to atone is...@get away from him...)
(Just go back without seeing@my parents...)

group_1.textRight: You're gonna leave without even@seeing them?
You can't do that. Go see them.@You don't have to worry about me.

group_1.textLeft: Fumu...

group_1.textRight: Since you survived...
I want you to live past that event@and forget about it.

group_1.textLeft: (You're wrong!)
(Don't say such nice things for my sake!)
(But you don't know anything...@So you can't help it...)

group_1.textRight: Hm? Your smartphone...?

group_1.narration: Thank you.@Keep doing your best at work.

group_1.textRight: Haha...yeah, that's right.@I have to "keep doing" my best.

group_1.textLeft: (This is all I can do...)

group_1.textCenter: ...Did she see right through me?@That I was about to throw it all away?
(That man was nice to me, but...)
(It's only because he thinks I'm an innocent victim.)
(If he found out the truth about the incident,@I'm sure he would also...)
(I don't know who he was the father of...)
(But she must have been very loved...)
(I'm sorry I'm the one who survived...)
